channel.title: Is MoparScape forums being attacked?
channel.description: I've heard that North Korean hackers are attacking websites in the U.S. and South Korea by freezing them, cutting off their connection, and preventing access to the websites. Here's the Yahoo™ Video link http://cosmos.bcst.yahoo.com/up/player/popup/?rn=3906861&cl=14405262&ch=4226713&src=news[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2009, 02:20:49 pm[/size][hr]The reason I posted this is because for about an hour today I couldn't go to the forums, it said there was a connection error

item.title: Is MoparScape forums being attacked?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian, post:13, topic:287909”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=380653.msg2863051#msg2863051 date=1247287629]

You actualy associated the US government being hacked to the attacks on this website. There are some individuals that have a grudge against the site and are sad enough to do DoS attacks to it.

cough T_X cough
[/quote]who is T_X?

An extremely good programmer that wasted his talents.

Actually, T_X knows as much about the female body as he does about programming - nothing.

He honestly just puts Botnets in downloads, he gets lucky and everyone calls him pro? LaL[/quote]
He was the first person with a high detail 503 client and did high detail on every client up from there. It was a cheap hack because it did it from a low detail client but then that just shows he knows his way around the client, am I right?

Read full topic
